text: is there a function that will take an Array{Any} and attempt to convert it to an array of the most specific possible type?

elements.text: is there a function that will take an Array{Any} and attempt to convert it to an array of the most specific possible type?

text:
```julia> promote_array(A) = convert(Array{reduce(promote_type,typeof.( A ))}, A)
promote_array (generic function with 1 method)

julia> test
1×3 Array{Any,2}:
 5  5.0  1.0

julia> promote_array(test)
1×3 Array{Float64,2}:
 5.0  5.0  1.0```

elements.text:
julia> promote_array(A) = convert(Array{reduce(promote_type,typeof.( A ))}, A)
promote_array (generic function with 1 method)

julia> test

 5  5.0  1.0

julia> promote_array(test)
1×3 Array{Float64,2}:
 5.0  5.0  1.0
